remarks: A version of the Axiom of Choice with no distinct variable conditions. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2002.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Dec-2016.)
statement: axacnd $p |- E. x A. y A. z ( A. x ( y e. z /\ z e. w ) -> E. w A. y ( E. w ( ( y e. z /\ z e. w ) /\ ( y e. w /\ w e. x ) ) <-> y = w ) ) $.
